mapper.select: SELECT pt_no, pt_title, std_id, pt_date, pt_remove, pt_seq, rn FROM (SELECT a.* , ROWNUM rn FROM (SELECT pt_no , lpad('ㄴ', (level-1)*4, ' ') || pt_title as pt_title , (SELECT std_id FROM student WHERE id = p.id) as std_id , pt_date , pt_remove , pt_seq FROM post p WHERE bd_no = #{bd_no} START WITH pt_seq IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR pt_no = pt_seq ORDER SIBLINGS BY pt_group desc) a) WHERE rn BETWEEN (#{page}-1)*#{pageSize}+1 AND #{page}*#{pageSize}
